Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Learn why the ancestral river of the Incas is so essential to the survival of the nearby villages. And why they are all in danger.

Clip.Title: ARABIA UNCOVERED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover Saudi Arabia's fascinating past, captured in over 200 artifacts. Each item reveals stories of the migrants, traders, and pilgrims who have been drawn to this land for centuries.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trek across the vast plains of China on the cramped but culturally diverse train line.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the St. Lawrence River and into the Gulf of St. Lawrence, an aerial survey above the Gaspe peninsula reveals a set of natural wonders - from the Blue Whales to the stone marvels.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out why some inquiring minds believe that the world is headed for ruin within the next century.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel up the 4,200km of one of the last remaining nourishing rivers in the world.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: THE LAST TIGHTROPE DANCER OF ARMENIA
Clip.Episode: The Last Tightrope Dancer of Armenia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The two most celebrated tightrope dancers in Armenia are now in their 80s. Now they share the same hope -- that the only remaining tightrope student will carry on their life's work. But will 17 year old orphan Hovsep want to accept the responsibility?

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the Alps to the Adriatic where the Mediterranean meets the centre of Europe, between mountains and long sandy beaches is a region that is a mosaic of history, nature and art that has inspired many literary masterpieces.

Clip.Title: MINDFIELD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Canadian Light Source is a facility where scientists can see matter at an atomic level. Featuring science fiction author Robert. J. Sawyer during his time at this world class facility.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Water in the World's 8th Largest Economy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As world population increases, the struggle over one of the earth's most valuable resources continues to intensify. Take a look at water in California, the world's 8th largest economy. Is the world in danger of running out of water?

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Journey into the Ice Age and Solar Eclipse Chasers
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey back into the days of the Ice Age and see what life was like. And, meet eclipse chasers - adventurers who travel the world to witness and document solar eclipses.

Clip.Title: ALIENS INSIDE US
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every one of us teems with trillions of microorganisms. Some of these microbes are what we call "germs," but many more of them are actually good for us. Discover the health benefits of having aliens inside us, and see how those benefits are being threatened by our modern, sterile lifestyles.
